title: Millionaire's Wedding Revenge
description: The Miami millionaire could have any woman--but Stephen Garrison intended to have newly returned Megan Simmons. She'd ended their sizzling affair years ago... leaving without explanation... leaving Stephen determined to seek his revenge.But his plan to seduce his ex-lover was met with an unexpected discovery: she'd had his child. And now it was no longer enough to seduce Megan back into his bed. Stephen had decided marriage would be the ultimate payback.
author: Anna DePalo
